Data Fields
Bsp_BoardDeviceData Struct Reference
Board API

Board specific per instance device related data. More...

#include <bsp_board.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 devDrvId
 
UInt32 instId
 
UInt32 i2cInstId
 
UInt32 i2cAddr

UInt32 drvInstId
 
Bsp_BoardSelectDeviceFxn selectDev
 
Bsp_BoardResetDeviceFxn resetDev
 
Bsp_BoardPowerOnDeviceFxn powerOnDev
 

Detailed Description

Board specific per instance device related data.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_BoardDeviceData::devDrvId

Device driver ID.

UInt32 Bsp_BoardDeviceData::drvId

Capture/display driver ID to which the device is connected to.

UInt32 Bsp_BoardDeviceData::drvInstId

Capture/display driver instance to which the device is connected to.

UInt32 Bsp_BoardDeviceData::i2cAddr

I2C address of the device.

UInt32 Bsp_BoardDeviceData::i2cInstId

I2C instance the device is connected to.

UInt32 Bsp_BoardDeviceData::instId

Instance ID - 0 to max-1 in a board.

Bsp_BoardPowerOnDeviceFxn Bsp_BoardDeviceData::powerOnDev

Power On device function pointer. This function will do the Powering on the device as per the board information.

Bsp_BoardResetDeviceFxn Bsp_BoardDeviceData::resetDev

Reset device function pointer. This function will do the device reset sequence as per the board information.

Bsp_BoardSelectDeviceFxn Bsp_BoardDeviceData::selectDev

Select device function pointer. This function will power on the device, do the device reset sequence and also enable any board level mux for the provided device.
